game.title: The Lost Sword
game.objective: Retrieve the legendary sword from the ancient ruins
game.description: Long ago, a powerful sword was hidden in the ancient ruins of a lost civilization. The sword is said to possess immense power, capable of bringing either salvation or destruction to the world. Your task is to find and retrieve the sword before it falls into the wrong hands.

task.description: The ancient ruins are guarded by various traps and monsters. You must find a way to bypass the obstacles and safely enter the ruins.
Inside the ruins, you will come across inscriptions and writings in a forgotten language. Use your knowledge and skills to decipher the writings and uncover clues about the sword's location.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian of the sword
task.description: The sword is guarded by a powerful ancient creature, awakened by your presence. Engage in a fierce battle and prove your worth to claim the sword as your own.
